parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Loose steering column bolts can cause the steering wheel to move freely, leading to a loss of vehicle control, which can result in accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The steering wheel moves freely
the steering wheel has excessive play
the steering wheel is loose
the vehicle is difficult to steer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the rack and pinion steering can cause the steering wheel and column to lock up, leading to a loss of vehicle control, which can result in accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The steering wheel locks up
the steering wheel is difficult to turn
the steering wheel requires excessive force to turn
the vehicle is difficult to steer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Increased steering effort can make it difficult to control the vehicle, especially during low-speed maneuvers or in cold weather, which can increase the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The steering wheel is difficult to turn
the steering wheel requires excessive force to turn
the vehicle is difficult to steer
especially during low-speed maneuvers or in cold weather.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat belt can lead to injuries or fatalities in the event of a crash, as the occupant may not be properly restrained.
symptoms: The seat belt fails to pull out
the seat belt locks up before latching
the seat belt does not buckle
the seat belt breaks
the seat belt does not restrain the occupant in a crash.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the throttle control can cause unintended acceleration, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The accelerator cable sticks
the vehicle accelerates unexpectedly
the engine surges
the vehicle is difficult to control
near-accidents or accidents occur.
